title: Dying Light 2 Stay Human: Gunslinger Bundle
description: Get the new Gunslinger Bundle to become a legendary bounty hunter. It’s time to bring some of the old ways back to The City and challenge the horrors of the night to a duel at high moon.
longDescription:
Celebrate the 10th Anniversary of Call of Juarez® Gunslinger with a special bundle that pays homage to the bounty hunter Silas Greaves.

It’s time to bring some of the old ways back to The City. Put on your cowboy hat, don the red poncho, roll up your sleeves, and duel with anyone who dares to look at you funny. Whether they’re undead or alive, your enemies won’t know what hit them as you drop dynamite, cut through them with your trusty knife, or better yet, drop from the sky using the new paraglider. Whatever you do, show ‘em all why true gunslingers say that if you climb in the saddle, you’d better be ready for the ride.

# This bundle contains:

-  Silas Greaves Outfit – vengeance will lead the way on this one, with the stench of death not far behind.
-  The Gunslinger – leave your horse at the stables. Travel with a paraglider that bears an image of the famous bounty hunter instead.
-  Bowie Knife – even a cowboy needs one for the road. You never know when you’ll run out of bullets.
-  Bowie Knife Blueprint – the key to building and upgrading your weapon. Sharper, stronger, and to the point.
-  Dynamite Blueprint – mine through walls of Infected. Go wild with a throwable that is bound to send shockwaves.
